Entries.summer_22_2: Dear @,^  I taped this piece of paper with your address on it to a pineapple and tried to mail it. Did it reach you well? Don't ask where I got the pineapple. I have my sources.^   -Dylan  %item object 832 1 %%[#]A Summer Pineapple From 20460_Dylan

Entries.spring_20_1: Dear @,^  Please bring me a geode. Just a standard geode. I love cracking those things open.^   -Dylan  %item quest 1200 %%[#]20460_Dylan Mail Quest
Entries.summer_19_1: Dear @,^  I would like a poppy. Could you grow one for me? Don't ask what it's for.^   -Jacob  %item quest 1201 %%[#]20460_Jacob Mail Quest
Entries.fall_2_1: Hey @,^  Give me cheese.^   -SKYE  %item quest 1202 %%[#]20460_Skye Mail Quest
Entries.winter_9_1: Dear @,^  Would you please bring me an aquamarine? I need it for an alchemical recipe.^   From,^     Kurtis  %item quest 1203 %%[#]20460_Kurtis Mail Quest
Entries.spring_10_2: Dear @,^  Could you bring me a bottle of wine? I'll pay you well for it.^Sincerely,^  Shelby  %item quest 1204 %%[#]20460_Shelby Mail Quest
Entries.summer_13_2: @,^  Could you get me a jasper? I know they're kind of hard to get, but I'll pay you. I need it for an art project.^ I hear you can find it in magma geodes.^   -Anastasia  %item quest 1205 %%[#]20460_Ana Mail Quest
Entries.fall_3_2: Hello, @^  I need 25 blackberries for a recipe. Can you get them to me?^   -Zech  %item quest 1206 %%[#]20460_Zech Mail Quest
Entries.winter_11_2: Dear @,^  This winter weather is making me crave a fish stew. Could you bring me one?^ Your friend,^   Ross  %item quest 1207 %%[#]20460_Ross Mail Quest
Entries.spring_11_3: Greetings,^  I require 100 coffee for a brew I'm working on. Please bring them to me at your earliest convenience. I will reward you handsomely.^   -David S.R.  %item quest 1208 %%[#]20460_David Mail Quest

Entries.Sun: I'm glad to have found an apprentice in Kurtis. He has a keen sense for the arcane.#$e#Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue. I trust Kurtis to carry on that task.

Entries.20460_Ross: My money's on Jas.#$b#I think she has it in her to win.#$b#She's been training for this moment.
Entries.20460_David: I painted those eggs.#$b#The paint isn't edible.#$b#Don't get any ideas.$s
Entries.20460_Zech: It's pretty cool that our community comes together for events like this.$h
Entries.20460_Shelby: I'm concerned about how long Ana's been at that buffet.#$b#Last year she went into an egg coma.$s
Entries.20460_Shelby_2: I swear, if Ana goes into another egg-induced coma...$s
Entries.20460_Skye: The grass is still all dewy from this morning.#$b#It's going to be a soggy egg hunt.
Entries.20460_Kurtis: Aren't eggs like a symbol of rebirth?#$b#Someone could make a religion out of this.
Entries.20460_Jacob: My, what a lovely day!#$b#Perfect day for an egg hunt.
Entries.20460_Ana: If there's one day of the year to eat eggs, it's today.#$b#I bet you I can finish that whole plate!$h
Entries.20460_Dylan: I'm just glad I get the day off of work today.$h

Entries.20460_Ross: I'm not much of a dancer.
Entries.20460_David: I'm trying to get Ross to dance with me.#$b#I've been known to set fires to dance floors.$h
Entries.20460_Zech: All the food is super cold.$s#$b#And that gelatin looks like it's about to fly away.
Entries.20460_Shelby: This festival is gorgeous!$h#$b#I appreciate all the effort everyone put into it!$h
Entries.20460_Skye: I'm staying as far away from the dancing as possible!$s
Entries.20460_Kurtis: Alex, why do you have to be like this? You're being so problematic right now.$s
Entries.20460_Jacob: So many pastel colors!#$b#I should have worn a nicer shirt.$s
Entries.20460_Dylan: I can't believe I was able to drag Skye here!#$b#I'm not so sure we're having a good time, though.

Entries.20460_Zech: This meat has my full attention.
Entries.20460_Shelby: I think this stew is a lovely idea.#$b#There are so many diverse ingredients in this valley.#$b#It's going to make for a great soup!$h
Entries.20460_Skye: I'm going to beat this drum so hard.$s
Entries.20460_Jacob: It looks so good!#$b#Don't muck it up!
Entries.20460_Ana: This soup sounds like a terrible idea.#$b#Imagine all the terrible things you can put into the soup!#$b#Vanilla extract? Baking powder? Cocoa powder?#$b#Wait, those are all ingredients to make chocolate cake.

Entries.20460_Ross: This is going to be so beautiful!$h

Entries.20460_Skye: Bruh, when are these jellyfish going to show up?#$b#I want to see them!$s
Entries.20460_Kurtis: It's a little brisk tonight.#$b#Fall is almost here.
Entries.20460_Jacob: The water is so calm tonight.#$b#Freaky.
Entries.20460_Ana: These jellyfish are beautiful.#$b#I vow to paint them from memory later.#$b#Art imitates life, and all that.

Entries.20460_Ross: Just one more round on orange.#$b#I swear, this will be the big winner!#$e#Wait...#$b#I'm out of tokens already.$s
Entries.20460_David: Look at these weapons!#$b#I'm more of an épée guy, myself.
Entries.20460_Zech: Just one more try! I know I can get the high score!
Entries.20460_Skye: Marnie's stand is really impressive!$h#$e#I hope she wins this year.
Entries.20460_Kurtis: She told me that I'm going to die soon.$s#$e#I want my money back and I hate it here.$s
Entries.20460_Ana: Oh no. Shelby has climbed into the chicken enclosure again.$s#$e#She just really loves birds.
Entries.20460_Dylan: I'm telling you, man. You need to bet on green every time!
Entries.Jas: Why does that lady get to pet the birds and not me?

Entries.20460_Ross: David! DAVID!#$b#Dangit. I've lost sight of him.$s#$e#We were supposed to be doing this together!$s
Entries.20460_David: What does this mean?#$e#I feel like I'm really close to getting it.
Entries.20460_Zech: I'm just going in circles, aren't I?$s
Entries.20460_Shelby: It's got my foot!$s#$b#You're going to have to push past me.#$e#Don't worry about me. I'm a lost cause.
Entries.20460_Skye: Boo!$h#$e#Did I scare you?$h#$b#I heard you coming around the corner.$h#$e#How'd I get here?#$b#I just jumped over the hedge.#$e#I miiiight be stuck here now.$s
Entries.20460_Kurtis: What she said.#$e#I cannot handle this right now.$s
Entries.20460_Jacob: Huh... whuh?#$b#How long have I been here?#$e#I'm losing track of time.
Entries.20460_Ana: No way, man. I am NOT going in there!$s#$b#I do NOT do well with scary stuff!$s
Entries.20460_Dylan: I don't know who brought this pumpkin pie, but it's delicious!$h

Entries.20460_David: I'm about to pelt Zech with a snowball.
Entries.20460_Zech: It's nice to hang out with all the other villagers.#$b#Festivals are so much fun!$h#$b#I feel like nothing bad is going to happen.$h
Entries.20460_Shelby: The forest looks so different in the winter.#$e#It's so quiet out here.
Entries.20460_Skye: I claim this igloo as my own.#$b#You are not allowed inside!$s
Entries.20460_Kurtis: I could really go for some hot cocoa.
Entries.20460_Jacob: I'm really digging Leah's sexy mermaid sculpture.$h

Entries.20460_Dylan: Skye and I built this igloo together.#$b#You can go inside if you want.$h

Entries.20460_Zech: Ooftah. I'm stuffed...$s#$b#But I want thirds...
Entries.20460_Shelby: I have gift-giving down to a science.
Entries.20460_Skye: I'm freezing out here!$s#$b#I should have brought a coat!$s

Entries.20460_Ana: Look at all those decorations and gifts!$h#$b#I'm so PUMPED!$h#$b#And I KNOW that Haley's going to love what I got for her!$h
Entries.20460_Dylan: I'm so ready for all this snow to melt.#$b#I was not built for this weather.$s#$e#I feel like my nose is going to fall off.$s

Entries.2046007/d Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sun/t 1300: 50s/13 15/farmer 11 13 0 20460_Zech 15 17 3 20460_Skye 13 16 2 20460_Kurtis 12 17 1 20460_Jacob 14 18 0 20460_Dylan 14 16 2/skippable/move farmer 0 3 1/move farmer -1 0 1/pause 500/speak 20460_Dylan "Okay, I found the last digit of the WiFi password.$h#$b#That means it's time for me to escape the apartment before my neighbor catches me."/emote 20460_Jacob 12 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak 20460_Jacob "Dang, he's way ahead of everyone else!$s#$b#Dylan's gonna win this game in no time!"/speak 20460_Skye "Wait, what's the premise of this game again?"/speak 20460_Kurtis "You're trying to scour your neighbor's apartment to find all the digits to their WiFi password."/speak 20460_Zech "Exactly."/speak 20460_Skye "What a weird concept for a game."/textAboveHead 20460_Dylan "I agree."/textAboveHead 20460_Kurtis "Agreed."/textAboveHead 20460_Jacob "I agree."/pause 3000/faceDirection 20460_Kurtis 3/pause 500/speak 20460_Kurtis "Oh hey, looks like we have a visitor."/faceDirection 20460_Skye 3 true/faceDirection 20460_Dylan 3 true/faceDirection 20460_Jacob 3/pause 1000/speak 20460_Jacob "Oh hey! @, right?"/speak 20460_Zech "Welcome to our board game club!$h#$b#We meet up on Saturdays here in the museum.#$b#I'm not sure if you've met everyone yet, so I'll introduce you.#$b#Here's Dylan."/speak 20460_Dylan "Hello."/speak 20460_Zech "He's really good at pretty much every game we play.$h#$b#To his right is Skye."/speak 20460_Skye "'Sup."/speak 20460_Dylan "They bring the vibes."/speak 20460_Skye "It's true. I do."/speak 20460_Zech "On their right is Kurtis."/speak 20460_Kurtis "Hey.#$b#I live way out in the forest."/speak 20460_Zech "To my left is my brother Jacob."/speak 20460_Jacob "Greetings!$h"/speak 20460_Zech "And finally, there's me, Zech.$h"/pause 1000/speak 20460_Zech "Feel free to hang out with us as we finish up this game.$h"/faceDirection 20460_Kurtis 1 true/faceDirection 20460_Skye 2 true/faceDirection 20460_Dylan 2 true/faceDirection 20460_Jacob 0/emote farmer 32/textAboveHead 20460_Zech "Now it's my turn..."/pause 1000/end

Entries.2046026/e 2046024/t 600 1700/d Tue: jaunty/5 17/farmer 100 100 0 20460_Ana 7 20 0 Robin 7 18 2/skippable/pause 1500/speak Robin "Oh, you can just borrow it.#$b#I haven't used that tool in ages! I'd love to see it get some use.$4"/speak 20460_Ana "Thanks! That would be great!$h"/pause 500/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/faceDirection 20460_Ana 2/pause 500/speak Robin "Hey, farmer!"/speak 20460_Ana "Hey, @!#$b#Robin was just helping me with another project I was working on.#$b#I'm trying to get into woodworking."/pause 500/faceDirection 20460_Ana 0/pause 500/speak 20460_Ana "Thanks again for the help, Robin."/speak Robin "Oh, it's nothing.#$b#I love seeing people getting into woodworking.#$b#Pretty soon, you'll be bolstering, jambing, beveling, seasoning, and finishing!$4"/jump 20460_Ana 8/emote 20460_Ana 16/speak 20460_Ana "Don't get your hopes up!#$b#I don't even know what half those words mean!$s"/speak Robin "Yeah, those words don't really go together anyways.#$b#But really, borrow whatever tools you need today.#$b#And I can help you get your own tools when the time comes.#$b#I know all the best brands.$h"/speak 20460_Ana "Thanks again, Robin!"/pause 500/faceDirection 20460_Ana 2/emote farmer 8/speak 20460_Ana "What's the project?#$b#Well...$s#$b#That's a secret!$h"/pause 500/end

I won't keep you for too long.#$b#I hope you have a great rest of your day!_Terrible._Oh, that's awful!#$b#Just know that you can talk to me any time.#$b#I won't keep you, but be sure to pay me a visit some time, okay?'
